languages.text: Священный ход по всему кораблю потребовал немалых усилий от бортовых исповедников и вызвал затруднения в работе нескольких отсеков: пустотники бросали свои дела, чтобы принять участие в церемонии. Впрочем, процесс затянулся достаточно, чтобы отвлечь паству от вредоносных размышлений до самого выхода из варпа.

Taking the holy procession through each and every chamber of the ship taxed the confessors and disrupted the ship's schedule as the voidsmen abandoned their tasks to participate in the ceremony. However, the ritual was long enough to distract the flock from perilous thoughts until the vessel exited the warp.
languages.original_text: Священный ход по всему кораблю потребовал немалых усилий от бортовых исповедников и вызвал затруднения в работе нескольких отсеков: пустотники бросали свои дела, чтобы принять участие в церемонии. Впрочем, процесс затянулся достаточно, чтобы отвлечь паству от вредоносных размышлений до самого выхода из варпа.

However, the ritual was long enough to distract the flock from perilous thoughts until the vessel exited the warp.

Taking the holy procession through each and every chamber of the ship taxed the confessors and disrupted the ship's schedule as the voidsmen abandoned their tasks to participate in the ceremony. However, the ritual was long enough to distract the flock from perilous thoughts until the vessel exited the warp.

languages.text: 神圣的游行队伍穿过了船上的每个船舱。不过，这样的安排不仅让忏悔者们不堪重负，也扰乱了船上的日程安排，因为船员们不得不放弃各自的任务参加仪式。不过，漫长的仪式足以分散人们对于不祥征兆的注意，直到飞船离开亚空间。
languages.original_text: Taking the holy procession through each and every chamber of the ship taxed the confessors and disrupted the ship's schedule as the voidsmen abandoned their tasks to participate in the ceremony. However, the ritual was long enough to distract the flock from perilous thoughts until the vessel exited the warp.

traits.locale_text: 神圣的游行队伍穿过了船上的每个船舱。不过，这样的安排不仅让忏悔者们不堪重负，也扰乱了船上的日程安排，因为船员们不得不放弃各自的任务参加仪式。不过，漫长的仪式足以分散人们对于不祥征兆的注意，直到飞船离开亚空间。

languages.text: Llevar la procesión sagrada por todas y cada una de las cámaras de la nave puso a prueba a los confesores y alteró el horario de la nave, ya que los soldados del vacío abandonaron sus tareas para participar en la ceremonia. Sin embargo, el ritual duró lo suficiente como para distraer al rebaño de sus peligrosos pensamientos hasta que la nave salió de la disformidad.
languages.original_text: Taking the holy procession through each and every chamber of the ship taxed the confessors and disrupted the ship's schedule as the voidsmen abandoned their tasks to participate in the ceremony. However, the ritual was long enough to distract the flock from perilous thoughts until the vessel exited the warp.

traits.locale_text: Llevar la procesión sagrada por todas y cada una de las cámaras de la nave puso a prueba a los confesores y alteró el horario de la nave, ya que los soldados del vacío abandonaron sus tareas para participar en la ceremonia. Sin embargo, el ritual duró lo suficiente como para distraer al rebaño de sus peligrosos pensamientos hasta que la nave salió de la disformidad.

languages.text: 船の部屋を残らず通って聖なる行進をしたので、儀式参加のためヴォイズマンは仕事を投げ出すことになり、贖罪司祭の負担は大きくなって、船のスケジュールを掻き乱した。しかし、儀式に十分な時間が取れたので、その間に群集を危険な思考から逸らせて、<歪み>を抜け出す事ができた。
languages.original_text: Taking the holy procession through each and every chamber of the ship taxed the confessors and disrupted the ship's schedule as the voidsmen abandoned their tasks to participate in the ceremony. However, the ritual was long enough to distract the flock from perilous thoughts until the vessel exited the warp.

traits.locale_text: 船の部屋を残らず通って聖なる行進をしたので、儀式参加のためヴォイズマンは仕事を投げ出すことになり、贖罪司祭の負担は大きくなって、船のスケジュールを掻き乱した。しかし、儀式に十分な時間が取れたので、その間に群集を危険な思考から逸らせて、<歪み>を抜け出す事ができた。

languages.text: Le passage de la sainte procession dans chaque salle met les confesseurs à rude épreuve et perturbe les plans du vaisseau, les cosmomarins ayant mis leurs tâches de côté pour participer à la cérémonie. Cependant, le rituel dure assez longtemps pour occuper l'esprit des croyants jusqu'à ce que le vaisseau sorte du Warp.
languages.original_text: Taking the holy procession through each and every chamber of the ship taxed the confessors and disrupted the ship's schedule as the voidsmen abandoned their tasks to participate in the ceremony. However, the ritual was long enough to distract the flock from perilous thoughts until the vessel exited the warp.

traits.locale_text: Le passage de la sainte procession dans chaque salle met les confesseurs à rude épreuve et perturbe les plans du vaisseau, les cosmomarins ayant mis leurs tâches de côté pour participer à la cérémonie. Cependant, le rituel dure assez longtemps pour occuper l'esprit des croyants jusqu'à ce que le vaisseau sorte du Warp.

languages.text: Die heilige Prozession durch jede einzelne Kammer des Schiffs kostet die Konfessoren viel Kraft und bringt den Zeitplan des Schiffs völlig durcheinander, da die Raumfahrer ihre Aufgaben ruhen lassen müssen, um an der Zeremonie teilzunehmen. Das Ritual dauert jedoch lang genug, um die Gläubigen von gefährlichen Gedanken abzulenken, bis das Schiff den Warp verlässt.
languages.original_text: Taking the holy procession through each and every chamber of the ship taxed the confessors and disrupted the ship's schedule as the voidsmen abandoned their tasks to participate in the ceremony. However, the ritual was long enough to distract the flock from perilous thoughts until the vessel exited the warp.

Das Ritual dauert jedoch lang genug, um die Gläubigen von gefährlichen Gedanken abzulenken, bis das Schiff den Warp verlässt.

languages.text: Geminin her bir bölmesinden geçen kutsal geçit töreni, günah çıkaranları yordu. Uçsuz erlerinin törene katılmak için görevlerini bırakması da geminin programını aksattı. Ancak ayin, gemi öteboyuttan çıkana dek cemaatin tehlikeli düşüncelerden uzaklaşmasını sağladı.
languages.original_text: Taking the holy procession through each and every chamber of the ship taxed the confessors and disrupted the ship's schedule as the voidsmen abandoned their tasks to participate in the ceremony. However, the ritual was long enough to distract the flock from perilous thoughts until the vessel exited the warp.
